ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In it are fruits and date-palms with covered spathes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There are fruits of all kinds on it, and date-palms with their clusters sheathed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Therein are fruit and palm-trees with their dates in sheaths,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There exists all kinds of fruits, palm-trees with sheathed blossoms,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In which are fruits, and covered dates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therein are fruits, date palms producing Akmam.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therein is fruit and palms having sheathed clusters,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therein fruits, and palm-trees with sheaths,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Wherein are fruit and sheathed palm-trees,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On it are fruits and palm-trees with sheathed clusters [of dates],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Therein are fruit and palm-trees sheathed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In it are fruits and date-palms with sheaths,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therein is fruit and date-palms, producing spathes (enclosing dates);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therein are fruits, date-palms producing sheathed fruit-stalks (enclosing dates).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therein are fruits and palm trees with sheaths,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In it are fruits, and palms in clusters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:11] In it are fruits and, the familiar, date-palms with sheaths, the spathes containing its flowers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein) in the earth (are fruit) different kind of fruits (and sheathed palm-trees) which has foreskin or shells, or anything that has not sprouted up.
